title: Triple Hub.

[[div class="fancybox"]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]

-----
+ Triple Fang presents:
-----

[[div class="fancybox"]]
Woe be to those who lie.
Woe be to the naive.
For the living sneer at the dead, while dead weep for the living.
They fervently make folly of life, yet cower at the visage of death.
A doctor's confidence is sacred.
A doctorâ€™s regret is feared.
I bled them the same.
[[/div]]
